    • turnInClass

      private java.lang.Class<?> turnInClass
      The Turn in class. The type of Item to be turned in. This would be represented as a string using the following example in the JSON configuration, "worldofzuul.item.Seed".

    • turnInQuantity

      private java.lang.Float turnInQuantity
      The Turn in quantity.

  • Method Details

    • turnIn

      public Command[] turnIn​(Item item)
      Turn in item. Tries to turn in an item, upon quest completion it will return completeQuest().
      Parameters:
      item - the item
      Returns:
      commands for removal of turned in items and adding of rewards

    • completeQuest

      private java.util.List<Command> completeQuest()
      Complete quest list.
      Returns:
      list of commands to add all items defined in rewards.
